parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the status of an objective that was defined in [[Briefing.html|briefing.html]].

Status may be one of:
* "ACTIVE"
* "FAILED"
* "DONE"
* "HIDDEN"

To refer to an objective that is named "OBJ_1", for example, use only the index number in this command (i.e. "1" objStatus "HIDDEN").

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> objectivenumber '''objStatus''' status

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> objectivenumber: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> status: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"1" [[objStatus]] "DONE"</code> 
Marks the objective named "OBJ_1" as completed.
</value></part></template>
